name: Stone Generator
explanation: Stones for resource and construction tables. Subtables have been sorted from common to rare. Subtables present stone types known in different types of genres and worlds. The first subtables are compatible with the largest number of  worlds, and get more specialized towards the end. Non-generic subtables are not called by default to retain compatibility with most settings. Some subtables intentionally overlap. See also: metal.json. Authors: Johnn Four, Jochen Linnemann, Esko Vesala. Sources: Wikipedia.org.
